source: TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_SEQ_00<tab>Kokosamu would share news of his master's latest advance in the arcane art of materia manipulation.
target: TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_SEQ_00<tab>狼煙の丘のココサムは、ミュタミクスが編み出した、新たなマテリア技術について教えたいようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_SEQ_01<tab>As Kokosamu tells it, Master Mutamix has developed a method for combining multiple pieces of unneeded materia to give them new form and life─a procedure known as transmutation. He encourages you to speak with the esteemed goblin scholar, that you might enlighten yourself as to the specifics.
target: TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_SEQ_01<tab>ココサムによると、5つのマテリアを合成し、異なるマテリアに変容させる技術を、ミュタミクスが編み出したらしい。狼煙の丘の「ミュタミクス」に話を聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_SEQ_02<tab>While the precise process of materia transmutation is too complex to be imparted to a layman, Mutamix generously offers to perform the procedure whenever you so desire. To take the goblin up on his offer, you need only bring him five pieces of unwanted materia.
target: TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_SEQ_02<tab>ミュタミクスの元に、5つのマテリアを持っていけば、マテリア合成をしてくれるようだ。さっそく試してみるといいだろう。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_KOKOSAMU_000_000<tab>Riddle me this, friend─have ye ever found yerself in the unfortunate situation where yer pockets were near to burstin' with all manner o' materia, save for the sorts ye wanted the most?
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_KOKOSAMU_000_000「コールマター」で儲けることはできなくなっちまったが、
その分マテリア関連市場が活性化してきた！
……アンタもそう思うだろ？

source: TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_KOKOSAMU_000_001<tab>Well, <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> have, and I tell ye, it felt like I'd brought a sack full o' fishin' poles to a gold mine. Now, I ask ye: what if there were a way to melt down a couple pieces of materia that weren't availin' you naught, and mold them into a shiny new piece that─Nymeia willin'─just might strike yer fancy?
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_KOKOSAMU_000_001だけど、どんなマテリアが生まれるかは運次第……。
武具を強化したくても、好みのマテリアが手に入らないと、
装着しようって気もおきやしねぇ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_KOKOSAMU_000_002<tab>Now, if yer as sharp as I reckon ye are, ye can already see where I'm headin' with this. Aye, that's right─thanks to Master Mutamix, now ye can do just that! Or at least, Master Mutamix can do it for ye.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_KOKOSAMU_000_002そうなりゃ、「コールマター」を売りさばこうとしてる、
俺たちギャザラーも、商売あがったりさ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_KOKOSAMU_000_003<tab>This most handy procedure is somethin' we like to call <var 1A 02 /var>shifty-makin'<var 1A 01 /var>. Rather, that's what Master Mutamix calls it. Meself, I've coined the term <var 1A 02 /var>transmutation<var 1A 01 /var>, which I'm hopin' might find favor with adventurers like yerself.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_KOKOSAMU_000_003そこで、耳寄りな情報があるんだぜ！
ミュタミクス師匠が、5つのマテリアを合成して、
「異なるマテリアに変容させる技術」を編み出したのさ。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_KOKOSAMU_000_004<tab>How's it all work, ye ask? I could tell ye, but why ask the student when ye can learn from the master? You'll find Mutamix right over there, likely jumpin' out of his boots lookin' to trade tongueflaps about his discovery.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_KOKOSAMU_000_004これもまぁ、運次第ではあるんだが……
不要品を新しいマテリアに変えられるチャンスさ！
興味があるなら、師匠に声をかけてみるんだな。

source:
TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_MUTAMIX_000_020Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Uplander seeks knowings of shifty-making, yes? Then uplander should make openears to tongueflaps of Mutamix.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_MUTAMIX_000_020シュコォ……シュコォ……
マテリア　マテリラ　いろとりどり
マテリダ　マテリガ　いろいろぞ～。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_MUTAMIX_000_021<tab>Process of shifty-making is of big help-use. First, be taking five need-not materia, yes? Melty-mix this one, mixy-melt that one, squeeze and squash, then bigeyes! Five need-not are reborn as one shiny-new!
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_MUTAMIX_000_021いらない　マテリア　5つの　マテリア
なんやら　かんやら　混ぜ込めば～
新たな　マテリア　生まれるぞ～。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_MUTAMIX_000_022<tab>Shkohhh! But shifty-making is not simple like crafty-making. Knowings of shifty-making are much and many, and uplander's braincase─though big for uplander─is small.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_MUTAMIX_000_022おぬしゃ　合成　したいぞな～？
ためしてみたけりゃ　もってこい～！
5つの　マテリア　もってこい～！

source: TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_MUTAMIX_000_023<tab>Uplander need not be making worry-face. If uplander has many need-not materia, bring them to tent-ring. Mutamix will shifty-make for uplander!
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_MUTAMIX_000_023なにができるか　運しだい～！
いどむも勇気　やめるも勇気～！

source: TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>Mutamix will perform materia transmutation for you at any time, free of charge. Bring the goblin five pieces of unwanted materia, and he will transmute them into a single new piece to use as you see fit.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_SYSTEM_000_030不要なマテリア5つを、ミュタミクスに渡すと、
それらを合成して、異なるマテリア1つに
変換することができます。

source: TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>That said, materia transmutation remains an inexact science. As for what manner of materia will emerge each time Mutamix works his wonders, not even the goblin genius himself can say.
target:
TEXT_SUBCTS814_01463_SYSTEM_000_031ただし、どんなマテリアに変換されるのか、
合成結果は運次第です。
不要なマテリアがある場合に、利用してみましょう。
